item.description:
Spencer Country Inn
500 Main St
Spencer, MA

This is on Rt 9 just over the Leicester line
Tel # 508-885-9036

Cost is $10.95 plus tax & tip. Figure on $14.00 per person.

Please RSVP by Wednesday Jan 2nd 6 PM so I can make reservations.

Thanks, and see you then!
item.why: Meet for brunch at this country inn. Hope to meet new members, come up with new ideas for meet-ups, and relax after the holidays
item.name: Brunch - Spencer Country Inn
